name: Domestic Violence Prevention Board
description: The Domestic Violence Prevention Board is part of the Domestic and Sexual Violence Prevention Coalition in Lexington, Kentucky. The board's mission is to create a culture of safety and empowered stakeholders through advocacy, education, collaboration, and service coordination. They work to prevent domestic and sexual violence by providing resources, support, and coordination of services for survivors and their families in the Lexington area.
source: Verified from multiple official sources including City of Lexington government website, Kentucky.gov resource guides, and various community resource directories
notes: Part of the Domestic and Sexual Violence Prevention Coalition. The board works to prevent domestic and sexual violence through advocacy, education, and service coordination. Serves the Lexington/Fayette County area. Note: Original phone number 800-258-3803 was incorrect - corrected to 859-258-3803 based on verified sources.
